description:
**Octopus Deploy**

This dashboard provides an overview of your [Octopus Deploy](https://octopus.com/) environment. Track key deployment metrics like success and failure rates, deployment frequency per project, and more. 

**Useful Links**

* [Integration Docs](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/octopus_deploy)
*[Octopus Deploy Docs](https://octopus.com/docs)
title: Octopus Deploy Overview

definition.content:
**Octopus Deploy**

This dashboard provides an overview of your [Octopus Deploy](https://octopus.com/) environment. Track key deployment metrics like success and failure rates, deployment frequency per project, and more.
The overview section gives you a high-level overview of the health of your Octopus Deploy server.
View the current status of deployments in your environment- are there many projects in the queue? Are there any deployments waiting for manual intervention?
Get an overview of overall deployment health and trend across projects. Use the project_name template variable to see current values per project

definition.title: Projects with Highest Average Deployment Time
Releases with the Highest Deployment Times
